description:
This course is a great summary of information and thoughts for those wanting to start a business, but who need a little help with knowing how to begin, and what to consider along the way. This course covers all the basics of business plans and what it takes to get started, and get ready to seek financing from a bank. This course also gives you the latest thinking in Lean Entrepreneurship!

  • This course includes 6 lectures and course notes
  • This course includes 6 short quiz's.
title: Want to Start a Business?   Here's How!
